question: Any Dua to have a desire of SON. Tell 1the dua in English as well in Arabic. Any DUA to overcome Jealousy. 2. Remove jealousy from my heart for others
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Recite this dua

Rabbi la tazarni fard dow wa anta khairul waaritheen

It is part of verse 89 surah 21.

It means ?Oh Allah do not leave me single (without offspring), and you are the best of those remaining behind (after I have left this world).

The cure of jealousy is to make sincere Dua that Allah Ta?ala grants all good to the person whom you are jealous of. Praise this person abundantly, even though it may be difficult to do so.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
